snippet: Gov. Rick Scott announced plans to sue the State of Georgia for cutting the flow of water that feeds the oyster beds and fish-spawning areas of Apalachicola Bay.
abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott plans to sue State of Georgia for cutting flow of water that feeds oyster beds and fish-spawning areas of Apalachicola Bay.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Scott announced plans to sue the State of Georgia for cutting the flow of water that feeds the oyster beds and fish-spawning areas of Apalachicola Bay.

headline.main: Florida: State Plans Suit Over Water
headline.print_headline: Florida: State Plans Suit Over Water
